name: Tanksplash
description:
Meet Tanksplash, a local multiplayer game you play via smartphone that allows you to play with as many players as you want! This game is ideal for a party or otherwise big events, since anyone can join and play at any moment!

Connect with your smartphone to your PC via your wireless network to take control of a tank in an epic war to dominate of the territory against another team.

  • A colorful team battle: Choose between team red or team blue and paint all the map with your team's color!
  • Easy to learn: You only need to learn three buttons: turn right, turn left and shoot! Even your grandma can play it!
  • Hard to master: Will you be able to learn the core strategies and the quirks of every kind of battlefield while you trying to coordinate with your team?
  • Build your fort: Take control of the map turrets by painting the areas surround them, and they will target your enemies for you! Be careful not to lose them again, though.
  • Fight through sand and snow: Battle through levels with forest, snow, and desert themes, each with different terrains!
  • Break the ice: The cooperation factor is perfect to get to know people better in a party or conference!
  • No internet connection required: The whole game runs on your local network, you won't ever have any kind of delay!

Take a look at how easy it is to set the game up:

  1. Open the game executable.
  2. You will see the launcher: you likely won't have to change anything here, simply press "Start".
  3. You might be asked to allow Tanksplash through your firewall: if so, allow it.
  4. Ask your friends to connect to the address given in the launcher in their phones and pick their teams.
  5. When you're ready, simply press "Launch Game"!

Attention: Tanksplash is in early access. All updates are free, forever! You can play it and have lots of fun, but any part of the gameplay can and will change in the future. It is being released as early access so that you guys can tell me how to improve it, since there are tons of directions i want to see the game going. Thanks for your patience!
